data.quote: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
data.author: Woodrow Wilson

data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
data.author: Carol Burnett

data.quote: Beginning today, treat everyone you meet as if they were going to be dead by midnight. Extend to them all the care, kindness and understanding you can muster, and do it with no thought of any reward. Your life will never be the same again.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
data.author: Norman Vincent Peale

data.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
data.author: St. Jerome

data.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
data.author: Bradley Whitford

data.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
data.author: Milton Berle

data.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
data.author: Norman Vincent Peale

data.quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
data.author: William Shakespeare

data.quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
data.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
data.author: Aesop

data.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: A single sunbeam is enough to drive away many shadows.
data.author: Carol Burnett

data.quote: A single sunbeam is enough to drive away many shadows.
data.author: Francis of Assisi

data.quote: A champion is someone who gets up when he can't.
data.author: Jack Dempsey

data.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
data.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
